<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/auth/token/verify/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Takes a token and indicates if it is valid.  This view provides no
information about a token's fitness for a particular use.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string","writeOnly":true}},"required":["token"],"title":"TokenVerify"}},"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string","writeOnly":true}},"required":["token"],"title":"TokenVerify"}},"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string","writeOnly":true}},"required":["token"],"title":"TokenVerify"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string","writeOnly":true}},"required":["token"],"title":"TokenVerify"}}},"description":""}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
